article:
{{Infobox VG character |name=HMX-12 Multi |image= |caption=Illustration of Multi
by TÅru Minazuki. |series=[[To Heart]] |creator=Tatsuya Takahashi |artist=TÅru
Minazuki |voiceactor=Lenore Lenore |japanactor=Yui Horie }} is a fictional
character in Leaf's and Aquaplus' visual novel [[To Heart]]. In the visual
novel, she is an experimental maid robot, and she made her first appearance as
one of the game's ten female main characters. Multi was created by writer
Tatsuya Takahashi, who wrote her scenario for the visual novel, and designed by
illustrator TÅru Minazuki. She is voiced in Japanese by Yui Horie in the visual
novel and anime, and by Lenore Lenore in the English version of the 1999 anime.
